usage: A chest for players to store and take treasures
interactivity: its hinged lid could be opened
interactionDeduction: Users will approach the treasure chest and use their hands to press down on the hinged lid to open it. The interaction will likely involve a momentary tap to initiate the opening mechanism, followed by a sustained contact as they lift the lid. The wooden texture will provide a tactile feedback, and users may feel a slight resistance when lifting the lid, simulating the weight of the chest.

usage: players will use it to open a tresure chest
interactionDeduction: Users will grasp the key using a precision grip, holding it between their thumb and index finger. The interaction will involve a turning motion as they insert the key into the lock of the treasure chest. The smooth finish of the key will provide a comfortable tactile experience, and users will feel the outline of the ring-shaped holding part as they manipulate it.

usage: players will use it to smash things
inertia: relatively heavy with the center of mass concentrated at one end
interactionDeduction: Users will grasp the hammer using a power grip, wrapping their fingers around the round handle. The interaction will involve lifting the hammer and swinging it downwards to smash objects. The relatively heavy design with a concentrated center of mass will provide significant inertia, making the hammer feel substantial in the user's hands. Users will experience a strong haptic feedback upon impact, simulating the force of a real hammer.

usage: players will punch it for blowing off steam
outline: the punching bag is positioned on the ground. make sure a proxy's volume covers this punching bag
hardness: feeling a little bit soft while punching
interactionDeduction: Users will approach the scarecrow punching bag and use their fists to strike it, employing a contact method of punching. The interaction will involve a momentary contact as they hit the bag, with the soft feeling of the punching bag providing a forgiving surface. Users may feel a slight give upon impact, simulating the softness of the bag, and they may engage in repeated strikes to blow off steam.
